document.full_text: rod blagojevich greeted old friends and reporters in court on thursday as the judge presiding over the former illinois governor's corruption trial asked prospective jurors whether they could be fair.
document.title: blagojevich watches jury selection at second trial
lines_and_colors: rod blagojevich greeted old friends and reporters in court on thursday as the judge presiding over the former illinois governor's corruption trial asked prospective jurors whether they could be fair.
